column6:
It begins here..."Spider-Man and his Amazing Friends!" Things are changing in the young life of Peter Parker: Johnny Storm of the Fantastic Four is now his buddy---and the hot-headed super hero has taken a liking to Peter's classmate, Liz Allen! But something is horribly wrong with Liz-something that will soon affect the life of every student at Midtown High-including Peter's ex-girlfriend, Kitty Pryde!,2008,1
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller (cover):Stuart Immonen | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Justin Ponsor
